column5: My party will be at the Fisheries Resort the week of June 18. Anyone have any fishing reports? Thanks
i have been trying to find a report too but no luck.we are going to the fisheries on july 23rd.if you would please post a report after you get back.
I know of one group that is there right now. They use this board so I would try again next week.
Will post our results once we get back home.

Red Gut as of 5/21 to 5/24; water temp 53 to 55F, Red Pine narrows slow most fish under slot. Most fish 11 to 19 feet, Ottertail River better, Lindy w/ floater around 20'. Locals were doing very well by railroad bridge around the corner from the fisheries, lots of high slots, lots of current. Seine river was 56 to 58F, lots of current, many fish, majority high slot, many 25 to 28" ended up fishing there most of the trip. By the 18th Blueberry Island and the narrows should be going good.
